Resources¶

Official Documentation¶

These are the docs I’ve found most helpful:

  • Flask Documentation - When Flask does something weird, check here

  • SQLAlchemy Documentation - ORM stuff can be confusing, this helps

  • PostgreSQL Documentation - Database reference

  • Sphinx Documentation - How this documentation was built

  • pytest Documentation - Testing help

Tutorials and Learning Resources¶

For when the official docs are too technical:

  • W3Schools HTML - Great for HTML basics (used this for lab 5)

  • W3Schools CSS - CSS help

  • W3Schools Python - Python basics

  • Real Python - Really good tutorials, usually explains things well

Git and Version Control¶

Git can be confusing, these help:

  • Git Documentation - The official docs

  • GitHub Guides - GitHub’s tutorial pages

  • Atlassian Git Tutorials - Really detailed Git tutorials

Security Resources¶

From lab 6 where we learned about password security:

  • OWASP Top 10 - Common security issues to watch out for

  • bcrypt Documentation - How we hash passwords

Additional Tools¶

Tools that might be useful:

  • Postman - For testing APIs

  • pgAdmin - What we use to manage PostgreSQL databases

  • VS Code - My code editor of choice
